sub_title: Cooking Instructor - Recipe Developer - Food Writer - Food Photographer
summary:
Italian born and raised, I own and run Italian cooking school "La Cucina del Sole"​ in Amsterdam since 2002.
I'm specialized in Italian regional, classic and healthy cooking and write (in Dutch, Italian and English) about food for culinary weblogs and magazines. I published my first cookbook "Antipasti"​ (in Dutch) in 2006. My second cookbook, "Cucina di casa mia - Recepten van een Italiaanse familie"​ was awarded 3rd prize as "Best Italian Cookbook in the World"​ at the Gourmand Cookbook Award in Paris (2013). http://www.cucinadicasamia.nl/
The third book "Gewoon gezond"​, written by nutritionist Rolien Scheepbouwer with recipes developed by me, has been published in May 2015. 
In 2022 I've followed two food photography courses with Lucie Beck.

In December 2009 I got qualified as Professional Sommelier by AIS, the Italian Sommelier Association.
In 2011 I've been pioneering a new field on Italian television presenting 40 episodes of "La cucina degli altri"​, the very first cooking program on Italian TV dedicated to the international cuisine (on Italy's biggest food channel, Gambero Rosso, Sky ch. 411). 
Between 2015 and 2017 I've been Jamie Oliver's Food Revolution Ambassador for Amsterdam, The Netherlands. In this role I've been teaching healthy cooking to children in schools and contributing to spread healthy, durable and sustainable food habits.
   
I am also a professional Italian voice-over with 30+ years of experience. I work with the leading Dutch and Belgian voice-over companies and lend my voice to videos, radio and TV commercials, Italian language courses, guided museum tours, voice response systems and much more. See http://www.nicolettatavella.com/#!voice-overs/c1dwo

Being an eclectic personality and very interested in spirituality I also enjoy working as a professional Tarot reader. On my website www.houseoftarot.nl you'll find more info about this activity.

Specialities: I'm an expert in the field of classic, regional, healthy and innovative Italian cuisine with an excellent knowledge of international cuisines.

profile_positions.company: Italian Cooking School "La Cucina del Sole"
profile_positions.description:
Italian cooking school in Amsterdam. The real Italian food experience in The Netherlands. 
For team building sessions with your employees, clients and colleagues: cooking together while enjoying drinks and nibbles, eating the wonderful Italian food you've prepared and sipping some good Italian wines together with your meal! 
I also organize workshops and 4-lessons courses with individual participation (so no need to book for a whole group of people), see http://www.cucinadelsole.nl (NL/EN)
profile_positions.title: Owner

profile_positions.description:
Artisanal herbal salts and condiments  handmade with ♥ in our Italian kitchen in Amsterdam.
Only the purest Italian sea salt, herbs, garlic, spices, vegetables & citrus zest.
Nothing else.

profile_positions.description:
Judge Food & Non-Food in 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020 and 2021. 
Each year, PLMA gives recognition to outstanding private label products introduced on the shelves of supermarkets, hypermarkets, discounters, drugstores and specialty retailers from all over the world.

Hundreds of products are submitted and selected for consideration, including food, beverages and wines, home and household, and health and beauty categories. Entries are evaluated by industry judges, professionals in retail and wine industry for taste, quality, appearance, packaging, product concept and value for money.

Judges for the International Salute to Excellence Awards are selected on the basis of past and current experience with product concepts, packaging, quality, product appearance and value for money. 
See http://www.plmasalute.com/judges
profile_positions.title: Judge Food & Non-Food  for the International Salute to Excellence Awards, PLMA

profile_positions.description:
I write recipes, food-related articles and blog posts in Italian, Dutch and English. My food consultancy activities include the development of new products, recipe writing, food photography, advising on the Italian and the Dutch food market and food trends. In 2014 I've developed a series of recipes for Grand'Italia's "Sugocasa" products, a premium range of bottled peeled tomatoes (see: https://youtu.be/DGVZVugVvvk). 

My first cookbook is "Antipasti"​ 200, Veltman Uitgevers (NL).
My second cookbook "Cucina di casa mia - Recepten van een Italiaanse familie"​ (www.cucinadicasamia.nl) is a collection of family recipes and was published in Dutch by Choizes in the Netherlands. Awarded a prestigious prize at the Gourmand World Cookbooks Award in Paris 2013: 3rd place in the "Best Italian Cookbook in the World"​ category.
"Gewoon gezond"​ is my 3rd book, written by nutritionist Rolien Scheepbouwer, with my recipes. 
For Dutch Detox Coach Jacqueline van Lieshout I've developed a cooking workshop focused on healthy, detoxing dishes which we've given together several times. Most of the recipes have also been published in her "Het tempelkookboek voor kinderen" book with healthy recipes for kids. 
As a food consultant I've worked for the Dutch Consumentenbond, Dutch TV programs "Kassa!", "Smaakpolitie", "Herrie in de keuken", "Tijd voor Max" (http://www.omroepmax.nl/tijd-voor-max/alle-recepten-fragment/nieuws/risotto-ai-funghi-porcini-e-mirtilli/), "Huisje, boompje, beestje" (see http://www.schooltv.nl/share/NPS_1242195) and "Wat de boer niet kent (24Kitchen).

In 2022 and 2023 I've followed several food photography courses with Dutch food photographer Lucie Beck. 
You can contact me for articles, essays, the writing of original recipes with beautiful photos, advice on the development of new food-related products and trends and for suggestions on the Dutch and the Italian food market.

My blogs: 
http://cucinadelsole.nl/blog/ (EN)
http://cucinadelsole.nl/nl/blog-nl/ (NL)
profile_positions.title: Food Writer & Food Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Professional Italian voice over. Voice over artist for radio and TV ads, guided tours for museums, language courses, company videos, computer games, cartoons, voice-response systems and much more. I'm the Italian Anne Frank's voice at the Anne Frank Museum in Amsterdam and the Italian voice of Cisco voice response systems. Among my other clients: Philips, Almo Nature, Benetton, Imax, A. Vogel, KLM's BlueBiz, Kawasaki, Dymo, Toyota, Invisalign 
I started working as a speaker/DJ/interviewer for local Italian radio stations when I was 15. Since then I've always worked with my voice and still love doing it.

You can visit my website here: http://www.nicolettatavella.com/#!voice-overs/c1dwo
profile_positions.title: Voice-Over

profile_positions.description:
Food, wine and writing are not the only passions I turned into jobs: I started reading Tarot cards at the age of 17 and at the time I did it for my friends using a booklet to understand the different meanings of the cards. Years later I decided I wanted to learn more than just "Tarot-from-a-booklet"​ and after 4 intense weeks of learning Tarot and Numerology in the States with Christopher Beaver between 2004 and 2006 I decided to start reading Tarot cards professionally. My way to read the Tarot is totally free from future-telling interpretations. I strongly believe in the idea that we all constantly create our “future” with our own choices, thoughts and beliefs so it doesn't make much sense to "read the future"​. I prefer to read the "now" so that I can give indications and advice on how to create a better future.
What I do with my work is to help people better understand certain situations so that they can choose more consciously and with a serene mind what their next steps will be. Every Tarot reading starts with a Numerology analysis on personal birth number/numbers and personal year numerology and related energy.

Visit my Tarot website: www.houseoftarot.nl
profile_positions.title: Tarotist and Numerologist
Certified Sommelier with AIS (Italian Sommelier Association)

profile_positions.description: Collaboration with the Dutch Fish Marketing Board (Nederlands Visbureau) writing articles/blog posts and developing recipes for their Italian site principessaplatessa.it created for promoting Dutch plaice on the Italian market.
profile_positions.title: Recipe developer and food blogger/writer

profile_positions.description:
I hosted 40 episodes of pioneering cooking program "La cucina degli altri" on Italy's first and biggest food channel, Gambero Rosso Channel, Sky ch. 411.
"La cucina degli altri" was the very first program on Italian television dedicated to the international cuisine. In a country in which until 2011 nothing but the Italian cuisine was available on TV this program has represented a great pioneering break-through in Italy's culinary development.
profile_positions.title: Cook/Host @ Italy's biggest TV food channel

volunteer_experiences.description: I've worked as a volunteer for the Dutch Animal Protection answering the phone ("Dierenkwijtlijn") to help people report/find back lost pets.
